ModMetaData.name: LMC24N.壁挂式太阳灯
ModMetaData.author: Murmur
ModMetaData.description: 汉化：jxb12306 Author jxb12306 FROM 3DM Mod/Localization Group 合集链接：http://bbs.3dmgame.com/thread-5842015-1-1.html 英文名：Plant Growing Wall Light 添加可以直接建造在墙上的太阳灯，默认情况下，它的功率比游戏自带的太阳灯小得多，但范围也小得多。 Adds a grow light that is placed directly on walls. By default it uses a lot less power than the Sun Lamp but also has a lot less range.
